message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product holds immense value, worth $10000 to us, and we believe it would be equally beneficial to you. Considering its exceptional quality and functionality, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $9500. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a high-value item at a discounted rate, tailored specifically for you. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.
